basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full-Stack Developer with hands-on experience building scalable web applications and AI-driven solutions. Skilled in modern technologies such as Vue.js, Next.js, Node.js, and Go. Recognized for delivering impactful projects, including an award-winning automation tool. I thrive on tackling complex problems and continuously expanding my technical skill set.

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

work.name: Trood
work.summary: Contributed to the core platform as a Full-Stack Engineering Intern, leveraging Go, Node.js, and Java to deliver production-ready features.
highlights: Delivered end-to-end production features for the Rizq Launcher MVP by writing backend logic in Go and integrating front-end components using Next.js.

Engineered resilient systems by developing core services (a gRPC-based text-to-speech module and a Telegram Bot) using Go, Node.js, and Java, and resolved complex multi-codebase authorization issues including two-factor authentication.

work.name: BigFoot Company
work.summary: Collaborated as a core member of a small team to build the AdsMriia retargeting platform using Nuxt.js, Vue 3 (Vuetify) with Pinia, and TypeScript.
highlights: Developed the AdsMriia platformâ€™s landing page and core UI components using Nuxt.js and Vue 3 with Vuetify, leveraging Pinia for state management.
Architected and implemented key dashboard and form features for user and campaign management, ensuring intuitive data visualization and input.
Ensured responsive design and cross-browser compatibility to deliver a seamless experience across devices.
Collaborated closely with backend developers on API design and integration to maintain smooth data flow and application functionality.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led frontend development projects and engineered AI-powered solutions while collaborating with cross-functional teams.
highlights: Led a major frontend migration of an exam management platform (examene.umfst.ro/login) from Vue.js 2 to Vuetify, enhancing maintainability and user experience.
Engineered and deployed "AdCognition", an AI-powered browser extension using TypeScript and a custom-trained TensorFlow.js model for real-time ad detection and blocking.
Developed "RoboGPT", a robotics application integrating NVIDIA Isaac Sim and OpenAI APIs to control robots via natural language commands.
Maintained a local Linux server for training machine learning models, handling environment setup and system monitoring.

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support while developing innovative automation solutions.
highlights: Won 1st place in a company-wide innovation contest by enhancing Otis, a JavaScript-based automation tool that automated form-filling and email generation, significantly improving team efficiency.
Honed communication, teamwork, and problem-solving skills while interacting with customers from diverse backgrounds.

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: An AI-powered browser extension for real-time ad detection and blocking.

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: An NVIDIA Isaac Sim extension for controlling robots via natural language commands using LLMs and OpenAI APIs.

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Won first place for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated form-filling and email generation
